body: From my opinion, old lobby(hub) was better. Now hub is smaller and not good for me. If you think that old one was better, we can create comminacaiton with a MapDev... (please write if you th!nk like me)

title: __HUB__

replies.body: The hub is only temporary. It will be replaced in the upcoming update. The reason to why the old hub was taken out was because it was very, very laggy. It will be replaced soon however! :)

replies.body:
The new hub is smaller to reduce the annoying amount of time it takes to Download Terrain while connecting to Avicus.
Let me also reinforce the fact that it is only temporary, and a new hub was already finished a long time ago, just waiting for the Winter Update to come out.
